In recent months, Iʼve grown increasingly concerned about the one-size-
fits-all approach many vendors are pushing when it comes to AI—
particularly in healthcare.

• While there is no denying that AI has transformative potential, and I do
love the technology, some of the messaging Iʼve encountered is starting
to raise red flags.
